block.p: Gray Rothwell Holmes, the daughter of Joan Rothwell Holmes and Andrew Scott Holmes of Bryn Mawr, Pa., was married last evening to William Sherman Hughes, the son of Dr. Bess Dawson-Hughes and James Sherman Hughes of Boston. The Rev. F. Washington Jarvis III performed the ceremony at St. Paul's Episcopal Church in the Chestnut Hill section of Philadelphia.
Mrs. Hughes, 28, is an associate at iStar Financial, a real estate finance company in New York, where she underwrites commercial loans. She graduated from Cornell and has an M.B.A. from Harvard.

Gray Rothwell Holmes, the daughter of Joan Rothwell Holmes and Andrew Scott Holmes of Bryn Mawr, Pa., was married last evening to William Sherman Hughes, the son of Dr. Bess Dawson-Hughes and James Sherman Hughes of Boston. The Rev. F. Washington Jarvis III performed the ceremony at St. Paulâ€™s Episcopal Church in the Chestnut Hill section of Philadelphia.

Gray Rothwell Holmes, the daughter of Joan Rothwell Holmes and Andrew Scott Holmes of Bryn Mawr, Pa., was married last evening to William Sherman Hughes, the son of Dr. Bess Dawson-Hughes and James Sherman Hughes of Boston. The Rev. F. Washington Jarvis III performed the ceremony at St. Paul's Episcopal Church in the Chestnut Hill section of Philadelphia.
Mrs. Hughes, 28, is an associate at iStar Financial, a real estate finance company in New York, where she underwrites commercial loans. She graduated from Cornell and has an M.B.A. from Harvard.

Her father is a consultant based in Radnor, Pa., who works with new companies seeking to develop information systems that prevent medical errors in hospitals. Her mother is a sales representative for Craig Drake Manufacturing, a jewelry manufacturer in Philadelphia.
Mr. Hughes, 28, is an associate at Summit Partners, an investment firm in Boston. In September, he is to begin studying for an M.B.A. at Harvard.

His mother is a professor of medicine and director of the bone metabolism laboratory at the Agriculture Department's Human Nutrition Research Center on Aging, at Tufts University in Boston. His father also works in Boston, where he is a partner in the Buenos Aires Real Estate Company, which specializes in Latin American investments.
